articles.title: Legend gone: West Indies on the hunt for new coach - ICC Cricket
articles.description: The West Indies have acted swiftly to their below-par performance at this year's ICC Women's T20 World Cup by announcing head coach, Caribbean legend and ICC Hall of Fame member Courtney Walsh, will not have his contract renewed.

articles.title: Russia 'gains ground in 80%' Bakhmut; Wagner parades U.S. armoured vehicle - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Russia’s Wagner forces are gaining ground in Bakhmut. Yevgeny Prigozhin, chief of the mercenary group, claimed that his forces control 80% of Bakhmut.
